title: Pumpkin delight pie
ingredients: ['85g instant vanilla dessert mix, such as Angel Delight', '350ml skimmed milk', '250g pumpkin puree', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/8 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/8 teaspoon ground allspice or ground cloves', '200ml double cream, whipped', '1 (23cm) prepared digestive biscuit base']
